summary: Implements a mock version of the AWS Transcribe service for the Moto testing framework, defining custom error types, inâ€‘memory data models for standard and medical transcription jobs and vocabularies, and API handlers that simulate creation, retrieval, listing, starting, and deletion operations.
business_intent: Allow developers to write and run unit or integration tests that depend on Transcribe without contacting the real AWS service, ensuring predictable behavior and faster test execution.
